Translations.Text: Bhabo akasera o ratera agantukera katha
ara ki tomake bujhate debe ke se'i ratera agantuka
ekati atyujjbala naksatra.
Pratyeka sara pakse'i -- tara upare ekajana tattbabadhayaka rayeche.
Sutaram manusa bhebe dekhuka kise theke take srsti kara hayeche.
Take srsti kara hayeche sabege-skhalita pani theke
ya nirgata haya merudanda o bukera pamjarera madhya hate.
Nihsandeha tini tara pratyabartane abasya'i ksamatabana.
Se'idina lukono saba-kichuke prakasa kara habe
takhana tara thakabe na kono ksamata o na kono sahayyakari.
Bhabo barsanonnukha akasera katha
ara prthibira katha ya bidirna haya.
Nihsandeha eti sumimansakari baktabya
ara eti kono tamasara jinisa naya.
Nihsandeha tara cala calache
ara ami'o parikalpana udbhabana karachi.
Ata'eba tumi abisbasidera abakasa da'o, tadera abakasa da'o kichuta samaya.
Mahima ghosana karo tomara sarbonnata prabhura namera
yini srsti karena, tarapara suthama karena
ara yini susamanjasa karena, tarapara patha dekhiye nena
ara yini trnalata udâ€Œgata karena
tarapara take sukiye pamsute baniye phelena.
Amara yathasighra tomake parabo, phale tumi bhulabe na
sudhu ya-kichu allah iccha karena ta byatita. Niscaya tini janena prakasya ebam ya gupta rayeche.
Ara amara tomara jan'ya sahaja kare deba sahajakaranera jan'ya.
Ata'eba tumi smarana kariye caloca niscaya smarana karanote suphala rayeche.
Ye bhaya kare se yathasatbara upadesa grahana karabe
kinta eti eriye calabe nehata duscaritra
ye birata agune dhoke parabe
Takhana se sekhane marabe na, ara bamcabe'o na.
Se-i yathartha saphalakama habe ye nijeke pabitra kareche
ebam tara prabhura nama smarana kare, ara namaya pare.
